name: questcoder
description: A monorepo for tracking coding patterns and platform progress

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c green,cyan "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd frontend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../backend && npm run lint:fix
scripts.type-check: cd frontend && npm run type-check && cd ../backend && npm run type-check
scripts.test: cd backend && npm run test && cd ../frontend && npm run test
scripts.test:watch: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c green,cyan "cd backend && npm run test:watch" "cd frontend && npm run test:watch"
scripts.test:coverage: cd backend && npm run test:coverage && cd ../frontend && npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:ci: cd backend && npm run test:ci && cd ../frontend && npm run test:ci
